CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open - Not Contacted') , 'Open', IF( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Working - Contacted') , 'Working', IF( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed - Converted') , 'Closed', IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed - Not Converted') , 'Closed not', 'Riju') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Current status
